dc_title_s: Chart showing increase and decrease of the population of the United States, area, debt, and other statistics of the eleventh census
dc_description_s: 1 map : col., encapsulated in Mylar ; 49 x 77 cm|Shows percent increase by state for periods 1850-1860, 1860-1870, 1870-1880, and 1880-1890.|Includes text, table showing increase for selected cities, and tables showing population, United States, 1800-1890, settled areas in sq. miles, and public debt in dollars.|Issued folded in pocket in back cover.
